00025 #ifndef _ROBOT_CONTROL_IKOR_JFKENGINE_
00026 #define _ROBOT_CONTROL_IKOR_JFKENGINE_
00027 
00028 #include <robot/control/ikor/ikor>
00029 
00030 #include <base/ReferencedObject>
00031 #include <base/Expression>
00032 #include <robot/SerialManipulator>
00033 
00034 using base::Expression;
00035 using base::ExpressionMatrix;
00036 
00037 namespace robot {
00038 namespace control {
00039 namespace ikor {
00040 
00044 class JFKengine : public base::ReferencedObject
00045 {
00046 public:
00047   JFKengine() {}
00048 
00049   virtual String className() const { return String("JFKengine"); }
00050   virtual Object& clone() const { return *NewObj JFKengine(*this); } 
00051 
00052   /*
00053    * Takes a smart pointer to a serial manipulator (manip), which contains Denavit-Hartenberg parameters
00054    *   that specify the joints. Constructs an expression matrix (J) for the
00055    *   Jacobian.
00056    */
00057   ExpressionMatrix getJacobian( ref<const SerialManipulator> manip );
00058   ExpressionMatrix getForwardKinematics( ref<const SerialManipulator> manip );
00059   
00060 protected:
00061   JFKengine(const JFKengine& jfke) {}
00062 };
00063 
00064 } // namespace ikor
00065 } // namespace control
00066 } // namespace robot
00067 
00068 #endif
